content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Mr. Wang, I am willing to negotiate the price. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Let's start with 450 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That is too low for me. I am looking for a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am still looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 550 Euro per month is my final offer.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of 600 Euro per month!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 600 Euro per month!
name: Haoyu Wang from China
